name: Super RocketBall -Football2018
description:
Super RocketBall - Online Multiplayer is futuristic Sports with action packed soccer game.

First time ever combine the fun of soccer with racing adrenaline in a mobile game
I bet you have never played soccer,basketball and ice hockey in single a game. This is all in one game were you can play not only football but ice hockey and basketball

In this highly advanced football game "BATTLE FOR GOAL" is the only formula to win. This action packed game brings the worlds best players into the football field. Get in your favorite car and go out on the soccer field like a rocket to hit the ball.

This game is a must play for everyone who likes to play unique football games, League of Football Cars, Soccer football,Soccer games or even car driving or car battle.

UNIQUE GAME FEATURES :
* 9 High detail cars with realistic handling
* 8 Amazingly fantastic stadiums with unique level design
* Simple and user friendly user interface
* Practice mode available to strengthen players ability


UNIQUE MULTIPLAYER FEATURES :
* Join high speed servers from all over the world
* Ability to create private and public rooms
* Play with all the mobile users around the world
* Unique features like kick player from room or make someone a host
* Live chat in lobby and in gameplay


If you are fan of Rocket Ball Champion Cup, Car Soccer League, Turbo Rocket Ball,Racing, soccer, football, cars, flying, turbo, rocket, nitro, customize, decals, vinyls, wheels then try this game.

So just TEAM UP with the best players around the globe and DOMINATE the battle ground.

**Thanks for download more then 50,000,000 + with in six month.**
**At a time 50,000+ user play world wide.**

**A word from over users **

#This is a fantastic game keep updating it . I would recommend downloading this game!
#This game is just like rocket league good job
#This game excels. No criticisms, this should be the game of the year.
#Definitely the best !!!
#I like it ! Super Rocket Ball
#Super game addictive
#Really good game with so many servers to join
#It's not exactly rocket league but it's as close as I've seen so far.
